asset.notes: TuneCore has secured all of its databases, shutting off all outside access.Following enumerations present before veris 1.3.3 removed: asset.governance.Unknown.

confidentiality.notes: Millions of Musicians' Information Compromised. Our initial investigation shows that the data that may have been accessed included names, email addresses, mailing addresses if provided to us, TuneCore account numbers, and TuneCore passwords.__Although TuneCore passwords were stored in a protected form, it is possible for a determined hacker, with sufficient time, using advanced computing tools, to recover those passwords.  For those customers who provided us with billing information, the data that may have been accessed includes: billing addresses; the last 4 digits of credit card numbers, as well as their expiration dates; bank names, the last 4 digits of bank account numbers, and the last 4 digits of bank routing numbers, and the name and address associated with the bank account on file.__Full financial account information is never stored with TuneCore.

discovery_notes: "We recently discovered suspicious activity on TuneCore's servers in November," he wrote, "and that on November 17th an individual illegally collected information from our servers."
notes: Tunecore_ US NY NAICS: 51222 Employees: 40   Incident:  Notification: 2015-12-04   Timeline Breach: 2015-11-17  Data Millions of Musicians' Information Compromised. Our initial investigation shows that the data that may have been accessed included names, email addresses, mailing addresses if provided to us, TuneCore account numbers, and TuneCore passwords.__Although TuneCore passwords were stored in a protected form, it is possible for a determined hacker, with sufficient time, using advanced computing tools, to recover those passwords.  For those customers who provided us with billing information, the data that may have been accessed includes: billing addresses; the last 4 digits of credit card numbers, as well as their expiration dates; bank names, the last 4 digits of bank account numbers, and the last 4 digits of bank routing numbers, and the name and address associated with the bank account on file.__Full financial account information is never stored with TuneCore.  Asset TuneCore has secured all of its databases, shutting off all outside access.
summary: Tunecore_CEO Scott Ackerman_sent an email to all users around midnight on Friday night that their accounts had been hacked three weeks earlier on November 17th. "We recently discovered suspicious activity on TuneCore's servers in November," he wrote, "and that on November 17th an individual illegally collected information from our servers." The data stored on the compromised server included customers' names, addresses, email addresses, TuneCore account numbers, and protected TuneCore passwords, according to the company.
